creator: pingloud
descriptionHtml:
ping’s patented technology automatically reads your text messages (SMS), Facebook Messenger, Hangouts, email and all other messages out loud!

ping’s is the ONLY app that lets you hear all your messages and email through your Alexa device. After connecting just say ‘Alexa, open ping loud.’

Get your drive score. Now ping can analyse your driving so you can see how you compare to other drivers. (Your data is never shared.)

Practice safe driving by having all your text messages, emails and other important messages read aloud with ping!

Email support@pingloud.com for assistance. We reply quickly.

Drive safer: with a totally eyes-free experience.

PRICING
1. Text messages / SMS are always free, forever.
2. The fully functional version is a free trial for 14 days from install and includes:

a) Email and all other message types aloud
b) Hear and reply to all your messages & email through your Alexa device
c) Get your drive score

Please email support@pingloud.com if you would like to use the app for free.

DRIVE MODE
• Drive safely by turning on Auto Start!
• This safe driving app will start automatically when you get behind the wheel (Bluetooth detection).
• Easily toggle between ping, your music and navigation.
• Have messages read aloud at a speed that works for you.
• Optional passenger mode allows you to hear who the message is from but will not automatically read it aloud.

TEXT MESSAGES & EMAILS READ ALOUD
• Texts/SMS messages automatically read aloud.
• Messages from Hangouts & Facebook are automatically read aloud.
• Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail.
• Reads messages aloud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others.
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
• ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional)

MESSAGES – AUTO RESPONDER
• Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Auto responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger. (Fully configurable.)

STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING
• Messages paused when you get a call.
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions.
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more.
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.)

PERMISSIONS

In order to successfully automate our many features, ping requires the following device permissions / accesses: Location, Contacts & Notifications. The application cannot function without these.

LANGUAGES
Reads aloud email and messages in any of these languages:

(You must have the relevant Google text-to-speech (TTS) engine installed.)

Arabic, Bangla, Cantonese, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hebrew, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Khmer, Korean, Mandarin, Nepali, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Sinhala, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian and Vietnamese.

Download now and end the cycle of distracted driving!

REPLYING
Many ping users have asked us to add replying using voice to text. We have chosen not to do so yet, for these important reasons:

1. It’s unsafe. Here is a study which shows that voice to text is as dangerous as manually texting: https://tti.tamu.edu/featured-project/voice-to-text-driver-distraction-study/

2. The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) guidelines specifically advise against this.

3. The technology is far from 100%. (There is no way to correct mistakes while you are driving.)

4. You can still use your Google Assistant to reply.

Email support@pingloud.com for assistance. We reply quickly.
descriptionShort: Reads your texts, email, all other messages aloud, and through your Alexa device

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Major new release: Alexa support!

1. The ONLY app that allows you to hear your messages & email read aloud, and reply, through your Alexa device.
2. See how well you drive. Access your personal Drive Score.
3. New home screen widget to easily turn Drive Mode on and off.

Please email support@pingloud.com so we can quickly assist you. Drive safe!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

title: ping: Reads aloud Texts, Email, all other Messages

creator: pingloud
descriptionHtml:
ping automatically reads your text (SMS) messages, Email, Facebook Messenger, Hangouts, Slack and ALL other messages out loud!

Perfect for when you’re driving, or when using your phone is unsafe, inconvenient, or illegal.

 Please note ping is not free. We rely on our community of drivers to support our state of the art technology and in return, we provide an easy to use tool that’s perfect for: Uber, Lyft, Via, Gett, ridesharing, truck, and student drivers.

ping is great for professionals or anyone else that’s always on the go commuting.

PRICING & SUBSCRIPTION

ping has three paid subscription options: $1, $4, or $7 /month, with a 14-day free trial on certain plans.

With ping’s out loud message reading and a one-tap auto responder, staying up to date with your messages doesn’t mean you need to be distracted by your phone. We automatically pause and resume audiobooks, music or other audio you’re already playing for the most seamless message reading possible.

You don’t need to choose between ping and your other apps, either. Especially while you’re in the car. ping works well with navigation and music apps!

Use ping with Android Auto

AMAZON ALEXA

Just say ‘Alexa, open pingloud’ to hear all your messages & email through your Alexa device. Reads texts, emails and all other messages, hands-free, quickly, and efficiently.

 DRIVE MODE • Drive safely by turning on Auto Start! 

• This safe driving app will start automatically when you get behind the wheel using Bluetooth detection .
• Easily toggle between ping, your music and navigation. 
• Have all messages and email etc read aloud at a speed that works for you.
 • Optional passenger mode allows you to hear who the message is from but will not automatically read it aloud.

  TEXT MESSAGES & EMAILS READ ALOUD

 • Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud 
• Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
 • Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail 
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others. 
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP AUTO RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• Auto responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this., and, the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com
descriptionShort: Out loud text, email & message reader with auto responder, music & navigation

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
LOTS of changes in this release:

Please note that ping is NOT a free app, there is a 14 day free trial.

1. Totally revamped drive screen allowing you to add multiple navigation & audio apps.
2. Easier to use favorite contacts & locations.
3. New subscription options.
4. Have texts marked as unread after reading aloud.
5. Use phone speaker to read aloud when using Android Auto.
6. Email signatures not read.
7. See how many unread emails you have before reading your inbox.

With ping’s out loud message reading and a one-tap auto responder, staying up to date with your messages doesn’t mean you need to be distracted by your phone. We automatically pause and resume audiobooks, music or other audio you’re already playing for the most seamless message reading possible.

You don’t need to choose between ping and your other apps, either. Especially while you’re in the car. ping works well with navigation and music apps!

Use ping with Android Auto

AMAZON ALEXA

Just say ‘Alexa, open pingloud’ to hear all your messages & email through your Alexa device. Reads texts, emails and all other messages, hands-free, quickly, and efficiently.

 DRIVE MODE • Drive safely by turning on Auto Start! 

• This safe driving app will start automatically when you get behind the wheel using Bluetooth detection .
• Easily toggle between ping, your music and navigation. 
• Have all messages and email etc read aloud at a speed that works for you.
 • Optional passenger mode allows you to hear who the message is from but will not automatically read it aloud.

  TEXT MESSAGES & EMAILS READ ALOUD

 • Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud 
• Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
 • Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail 
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others. 
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP AUTO RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• Auto responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this., and, the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com
descriptionShort: Out loud text, email & message reader with auto responder, music & navigation

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
LOTS of changes in this release:

Please note that ping is NOT a free app, there is a 14 day free trial.

1. Totally revamped drive screen allowing you to add multiple navigation & audio apps.
2. Easier to use favorite contacts & locations.
3. New subscription options.
4. Have texts & email marked as unread after reading aloud.
5. Use phone speaker to read aloud when using Android Auto.
6. Email signatures not read.
7. See how many unread emails you have before reading your inbox.

ping has three paid subscription options: $2, $4, or $7 / month, with a 14-day free trial on certain plans.

With ping’s out loud message reading and a one-tap auto responder, staying up to date with your messages doesn’t mean you need to be distracted by your phone. We automatically pause and resume audiobooks, music or other audio you’re already playing for the most seamless message reading possible.

You don’t need to choose between ping and your other apps, either. Especially while you’re in the car. ping works well with navigation and music apps!

Use ping with Android Auto

AMAZON ALEXA

Just say ‘Alexa, open pingloud’ to hear all your messages & email through your Alexa device. Reads texts, emails and all other messages, hands-free, quickly, and efficiently.

 DRIVE MODE • Drive safely by turning on Auto Start! 

• This safe driving app will start automatically when you get behind the wheel using Bluetooth detection .
• Easily toggle between ping, your music and navigation. 
• Have all messages and email etc read aloud at a speed that works for you.
 • Optional passenger mode allows you to hear who the message is from but will not automatically read it aloud.

  TEXT MESSAGES & EMAILS READ ALOUD

 • Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud .
• Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
 • Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail 
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others. 
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• One-tap responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com

With ping’s out loud message reading and a one-tap auto responder, staying up to date with your messages doesn’t mean you need to be distracted by your phone. We automatically pause and resume audiobooks, music or other audio you’re already playing for the most seamless message reading possible.

You don’t need to choose between ping and your other apps, either. Especially while you’re in the car. ping works well with navigation and music apps!

Use ping with Android Auto

AMAZON ALEXA

Just say ‘Alexa, open pingloud’ to hear all your messages & email through your Alexa device. Reads texts, emails and all other messages, hands-free, quickly, and efficiently.

 DRIVE MODE • Drive safely by turning on Auto Start! 

• This safe driving app will start automatically when you get behind the wheel using Bluetooth detection .
• Easily toggle between ping, your music and navigation. 
• Have all messages and email etc read aloud at a speed that works for you.
 • Optional passenger mode allows you to hear who the message is from but will not automatically read it aloud.

  TEXT MESSAGES & EMAILS READ ALOUD

 • Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud .
• Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
 • Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail 
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others. 
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• One-tap responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com
descriptionShort: Out loud text, email & message reader with auto responder, music & navigation

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Last update of 2020. Happy New Year!

(Please note that ping is NOT a free app, there is a 14 day free trial.)

1. Have texts (sms) and / or emails marked unread after reading.
2. See how many unread messages & email you have before reading them.
3. Background message & email monitoring so all / any unread messages are immediately available.
4. All messages & email available through your Alexa device.

Drive safe!

You don’t need to choose between ping and your other apps, either. Especially while you’re in the car. ping works well with navigation and music apps!

Use ping with Android Auto

AMAZON ALEXA

Just say ‘Alexa, open pingloud’ to hear all your messages & email through your Alexa device. Reads texts, emails and all other messages, hands-free, quickly, and efficiently.

 DRIVE MODE • Drive safely by turning on Auto Start! 

• This safe driving app will start automatically when you get behind the wheel using Bluetooth detection .
• Easily toggle between ping, your music and navigation. 
• Have all messages and email etc read aloud at a speed that works for you.
 • Optional passenger mode allows you to hear who the message is from but will not automatically read it aloud.

  TEXT MESSAGES & EMAILS READ ALOUD

 • Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud .
• Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
 • Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail 
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others. 
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• One-tap responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com
descriptionShort: Out loud text, email & message reader with auto responder, music & navigation

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New in this release:

****Please note that ping is NOT a free app.
There is a 14 day free trial.*****

1. NEW FEATURE: Now with voice commands (Beta: English & German only.)
2. All messages & email available through your Alexa device. (And replying.)
3. New video tutorial to help you get set up properly.
4. Home screen widget for easy on/off.

 DRIVE MODE • Drive safely by turning on Auto Start! 

• This safe driving app will start automatically when you get behind the wheel using Bluetooth detection .
• Easily toggle between ping, your music and navigation. 
• Have all messages and email etc read aloud at a speed that works for you.
 • Optional passenger mode allows you to hear who the message is from but will not automatically read it aloud.

  TEXT MESSAGES & EMAILS READ ALOUD

 • Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud .
• Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
 • Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail 
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others. 
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• One-tap responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com
descriptionShort: Out loud text, email & message reader with auto responder, music & navigation

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New in this release:

Please note that ping is NOT a free app.
There is a 14 day free trial.

1. NEW FEATURE: Now with voice commands (Beta: English & German only.)
2. All messages & email available through your Alexa device. (And replying.)
3. New video tutorial to help you get set up properly.
4. Home screen widget for easy on/off.

Drive safe!

 • Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud .
• Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
 • Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail 
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others. 
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• One-tap responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com
descriptionShort: Out loud text, email & message reader with auto responder, music & navigation

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• One-tap responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com

• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com
descriptionShort: Out loud text, email & message reader with auto responder, music & navigation

title: Reads out loud Texts, Email and all other Messages

creator: pingloud
descriptionHtml:
ping is NOT a free app, we offer a 14 day free trial.

ping automatically reads your text (SMS) messages, Email, Facebook Messenger, Hangouts, Slack and ALL other messages out loud!

Perfect for when you’re driving, or when using your phone is unsafe, inconvenient, or illegal.

We provide an easy to use tool that’s perfect for: Uber, Lyft, Via, Gett, ridesharing, truck, commercial and student drivers.

ping is great for professionals, or anyone else on the go commuting.

PRICING & SUBSCRIPTION

ping has three paid subscription options: $2, $4, or $7 / month, with a 14-day free trial on certain plans.

With ping’s out loud message reading and a one-tap auto responder, staying up to date with your messages doesn’t mean you need to be distracted by your phone. We automatically pause and resume audiobooks, music or other audio you’re already playing for the most seamless message reading possible.

You don’t need to choose between ping and your other apps, either. Especially while you’re in the car. ping works well with navigation and music apps!

Use ping with Android Auto

AMAZON ALEXA

Just say ‘Alexa, open pingloud’ to hear all your messages & email through your Alexa device. Reads texts, emails and all other messages, hands-free, quickly, and efficiently.

 DRIVE MODE • Drive safely by turning on Auto Start! 

• This safe driving app will start automatically when you get behind the wheel using Bluetooth detection .
• Easily toggle between ping, your music and navigation. 
• Have all messages and email etc read aloud at a speed that works for you.
 • Optional passenger mode allows you to hear who the message is from but will not automatically read it aloud.

  TEXT MESSAGES & EMAILS READ ALOUD

 • Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud .
• Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
 • Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail 
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others. 
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• One-tap responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com

Please note that ping is NOT a free app.
(There is a 14 day free trial.)

1. NEW FEATURES: redesigned settings.
2. Google Maps and music controls on the drive screen.
3. Read your upcoming calendar events.
4. Choose a priority account.
5. Add ping's Drive Mode next to airplane mode.

Drive safe!

title: Reads aloud texts/sms, email & all other messages

creator: pingloud
descriptionHtml:
ping is NOT a free app, we offer a 14 day free trial.

ping automatically reads your text (SMS) messages, Email, Facebook Messenger, Hangouts, Slack and ALL other messages out loud!

Perfect for when you’re driving, or when using your phone is unsafe, inconvenient, or illegal.

We provide an easy to use tool that’s perfect for: Uber, Lyft, Via, Gett, ridesharing, truck, commercial and student drivers.

ping is great for professionals, or anyone else on the go commuting.

PRICING & SUBSCRIPTION

ping has three paid subscription options: $2, $4, or $7 / month, with a 14-day free trial on certain plans.

With ping’s out loud message reading and a one-tap auto responder, staying up to date with your messages doesn’t mean you need to be distracted by your phone. We automatically pause and resume audiobooks, music or other audio you’re already playing for the most seamless message reading possible.

You don’t need to choose between ping and your other apps, either. Especially while you’re in the car. ping works well with navigation and music apps!

Use ping with Android Auto

AMAZON ALEXA

Just say ‘Alexa, open pingloud’ to hear all your messages & email through your Alexa device. Reads texts, emails and all other messages, hands-free, quickly, and efficiently.

 DRIVE MODE • Drive safely by turning on Auto Start! 

• This safe driving app will start automatically when you get behind the wheel using Bluetooth detection .
• Easily toggle between ping, your music and navigation. 
• Have all messages and email etc read aloud at a speed that works for you.
 • Optional passenger mode allows you to hear who the message is from but will not automatically read it aloud.

  TEXT MESSAGES & EMAILS READ ALOUD

 • Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud .
• Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
 • Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail 
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others. 
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• One-tap responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com
descriptionShort: Out loud text, email & message reader with auto responder, music & navigation

ping has three paid subscription options: $2, $4, or $7 / month, with a 14-day free trial on certain plans.

With ping’s out loud message reading and a one-tap auto responder, staying up to date with your messages doesn’t mean you need to be distracted by your phone. We automatically pause and resume audiobooks, music or other audio you’re already playing for the most seamless message reading possible.

You don’t need to choose between ping and your other apps, either. Especially while you’re in the car. ping works well with navigation and music apps!

Use ping with Android Auto

AMAZON ALEXA

Just say ‘Alexa, open pingloud’ to hear all your messages & email through your Alexa device. Reads texts, emails and all other messages, hands-free, quickly, and efficiently.

 DRIVE MODE • Drive safely by turning on Auto Start! 

• This safe driving app will start automatically when you get behind the wheel using Bluetooth detection .
• Easily toggle between ping, your music and navigation. 
• Have all messages and email etc read aloud at a speed that works for you.
 • Optional passenger mode allows you to hear who the message is from but will not automatically read it aloud.

  TEXT MESSAGES & EMAILS READ ALOUD

 • Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud .
• Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
 • Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail 
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others. 
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• One-tap responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com
descriptionShort: Out loud text, email & message reader with auto responder, music & navigation

 • Optional passenger mode allows you to hear who the message is from but will not automatically read it aloud.

  TEXT MESSAGES & EMAILS READ ALOUD

 • Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud .
• Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
 • Automatically read aloud email for all email types: Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP and Hotmail 
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, SnapChat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack and all others. 
• Reads aloud your inbox emails.
 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• One-tap responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com

 • ping will not read promotional or social media emails. (Optional) 
 
MESSAGES – ONE-TAP RESPONDER

 • Drive safely by dismissing, archiving or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps.
• Large buttons are easy to see and press .
• One-tap responder for texts (SMS messages), Telegram, WeChat, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

 STOP DISTRACTED DRIVING

 • Message reading is paused when you get a call. 
• Message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions. 
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast and more. 
• Read your messages even if your screen is turned off. (Great for battery life, when active or when driving at night.) 

 DRIVING SCORE

Find out how great of a driver you really are with our new Driving Score feature. Receive insights about your driving that you can’t find anywhere else. Get scored on your:

• Breaking and acceleration accuracy.
• How well you adhere to speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• How focused you are while driving.
• How hard your turns are.

With ping, you’ll become a better driver in every way, shape, and form.

CAN YOU USE ping TO RESPOND TO MESSAGES?

 Many have asked us to add a feature that allows replying using voice to text. We have decided against this feature due to several reasons:   It’s unsafe and very distracting, The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines specifically advise against this, and the technology is simply not accurate enough yet.

NEED HELP OR SUPPORT?

 If you have any feedback, questions or have trouble using the app, email support@pingloud.com

title: Reads aloud all msgs and email

creator: ping: Read messages & email out loud
descriptionHtml:
ping's text to speech reader lets you read aloud email, SMS text messages, and & messages from ANY platform in 127 languages while driving with ping to help you 📲 hear text and drive safely 🚘.

Use the T2S text aloud reader narration to unlock continuous text to speech messaging options with a monthly subscription of $2.99. Enjoy a 14-day trial before being charged 💸.

The out loud reader will automatically read texts aloud, SMS msgs, email, Facebook Messenger, Instagram, Hangouts, Slack, & all other messages out loud!

Integrated with Android Auto & Apple CarPlay, ping uses a 🗣️ screen reader to listen to text and drive on your driving commute or while biking & running hands-free for a narrated text and drive experience. Get msgs hands-free driving Uber & Lyft ridesharing, truck, commercial, & student drivers.

Eliminate distracted driving with T2S out loud message reading & a one-tap auto responder for messages. Automatically pause & resume audiobooks, music, & any audio already playing for reading messages out loud.

[ Amazon Alexa 🎙️]

Alexa, meet T2S. Simply command 'Alexa, open pingloud' to convert text messages & email read aloud through your Amazon Alexa device, using our advanced Text-to-Speech (T2S) screen reader. Reading out loud texts, emails, & all other messages is now hands-free.

[ T2S Drive Mode Features w/ Android Auto 🚗]

• Drive safely by with Auto Start, compatible with Android Auto!
• This safe driving app starts automatically when you drive via Bluetooth detection.
• Toggle between ping, music, & Android Auto navigation.
• Have all text messages & email read aloud at a speed that works for you.
• Optional passenger mode SMS reader to hear who sent the message without automatically reading messages aloud.

[ T2S Text Messages & Emails Read Aloud Capabilities 📨]

• Texts/SMS messages automatically read out loud.
• T2S Messages from Instagram & Facebook are automatically read out loud.
• Automatically read aloud email for Gmail, MS Exchange, Yahoo, iMAP, Hotmail, & others.
• Reads messages out loud from Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, LinkedIn, Snapchat, WeChat, Viber, Tango, Google Hangouts, Slack & all others.
• Email inbox aloud reader.
• ping will not read text via marketing or social media emails (Optional).

[ Messages – One-Tap Responder 📬]

• Drive safely by dismissing, archiving, or calling the sender back with simple one-touch screen taps, simultaneously using Android Auto, Apple Carplay, & Amazon Alexa.
• One-tap responder for SMS messages, Telegram, WeChat, Instagram, TikTok, Hangouts & Facebook Messenger.

[ T2S Anti-Distraction Driving Measures 🚫 ]

• Text reader messages are paused when you get a call.
• Text message reading paused when your navigation needs to give you directions using Android Auto or Apple Carplay.
• Reads messages by pausing your music, audiobook, podcast, & more.
• Read your messages even if your phone screen is off. (Great for battery life & when active or driving at night.)

[ Drive Score & Safety Features 🚦🛡️]

Drive safely 🚗 in your automobile with ping's Drive Score 📈, which evaluates your safe driving habits & offers roadside assistance & emergency contact notification 🚨. Use the Drive Score when negotiating your car insurance rates 💲to show safe driving habits, which may lower your auto insurance premiums.

Your Drive Score:

• Breaking & acceleration accuracy.
• Adhering to driving speed limits.
• How smooth you drive.
• Your focus while driving.
• How hard your drive turns are.

[ Respond to Messages Restrictions❗]

You can't reply using voice to text because the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration guidelines advise against voice to text while driving.

No matter the vehicle - from minivans & trucks to e-bikes or scooters - ping is your versatile driving & commuting app. Enhance your driving time ⏰ with the hands-free driving app compatible with Android Auto & Apple CarPlay 🍏🤖 in 127 languages on any messaging platform.

creator: ping: Read messages & email out loud

ping's text to speech reader lets you read aloud email, SMS text messages, and & messages from ANY platform in 127 languages while driving with ping to help you 📲 hear text and drive safely 🚘.

Use the T2S text aloud reader narration to unlock continuous text to speech messaging options with a monthly subscription of $2.99. Enjoy a 14-day trial before being charged 💸.

The out loud reader will automatically read texts aloud, SMS msgs, email, Facebook Messenger, Instagram, Hangouts, Slack, & all other messages out loud!

Integrated with Android Auto & Apple CarPlay, ping uses a 🗣️ screen reader to listen to text and drive on your driving commute or while biking & running hands-free for a narrated text and drive experience. Get msgs hands-free driving Uber & Lyft ridesharing, truck, commercial, & student drivers.

Eliminate distracted driving with T2S out loud message reading & a one-tap auto responder for messages. Automatically pause & resume audiobooks, music, & any audio already playing for reading messages out loud.

• Optional passenger mode SMS reader to hear who sent the message without automatically reading messages aloud.
